meanings.definition: A complex of ribosomes held together by a strand of messenger RNA, synthesizing proteins simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The polyribosome in the cell was busy making proteins.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the polyribosome to understand protein synthesis.
meanings.sent3: The polyribosome threw a protein party inside the cell.
meanings.sent4: The polyribosome orchestra played a symphony of protein production.
meanings.sent5: The polyribosome worked like a team of tiny protein factories.
